content.description: The figure shows a sphere that can expand. As it expands, the volume inside the sphere and the radius of the sphere both increase. In particular, the radius increases at a decreasing rate with respect to the volume.
content.question: Which of the following graphs could depict this situation, where volume, in cubic centimeters, is the independent variable and radius, in centimeters, is the dependent variable?
